data.title: Mood Stabilizers: Lithium
data.meta_description: The developmental history of lithium and its physicochemical properties, pharmacokinetics, and mechanisms of action are presented. Among the latter, the effect on the phosphatidylinositol (PI) system and the inhibition of the glycogen synthase kinase 3beta...
